article_title: Larry Robbins' Obamacare Bet Makes Him Hedge Fund Manager Of The Year

article_metadata.description: Larry Robbins, who runs hedge fund firm Glenview Capital Management, made a huge bet on Obamacare and the U.S. stock market that is paying off in a big way
article_metadata.author: Nathan Vardi
